entry.title: 12th Quarterly R Users Hamburg Meetup
entry.content:
12th quarterly R meetup

Mar 20, 2018 · 18:00 @ Zalando adtech lab

AOB

12th RUsersHH Meetup

Workshop

  1. Free Workshop on Deep Learning with R - Michał Maj [ twitter ] [ linkedin ] [ github ]

Artificial Intelligence or AI has exploded in popularity both in business as in society. Companies large and small are redirecting their digital transformation to include technologies that are the true representation of what AI currently is; namely, deep learning. Deep learning is a subset of machine learning, which more generally, falls into data science. Both machine learning and deep learning find themselves at the peak of 2017’s Gartner Hype Cycle and are already making a huge impact on the current technological status quo. Let’s take a look at one way of going about creating a basic machine learning model. [ source ]

  • blog post 1
  • blog post 2
  • github repo

Deep learning is a subset of machine learning, which more generally, falls into data science. Both machine learning and deep learning find themselves at the peak of 2017’s Gartner Hype Cycle and are already making a huge impact on the current technological status quo. Let’s take a look at one way of going about creating a basic machine learning model. [ source ] blog post 1 blog post 2 github repo

entry.title: 10th Quarterly R Users Hamburg Meetup
entry.content:
Aug 1, 2017 · 19:00 @ XING AG

AOB:

10th RUsersHH Meetup

Talks:

  1. Rcpp tutorial - Marvin N. Wright

Lightning talks:

  1. crossword-pkg - Peter Meißner
  2. r2anki-pkg - Henning Bumann (Link to r2anki-Repository)
  3. Visualization of usage of bike sharing network in Hamburg (StadtRAD) - Alex Kruse
  4. Advanced R Solutions - Malte Grosser

entry.title: 8th Quarterly R Users Hamburg Meetup

  2. WhatsappR Package - Boris L.S.

Lightning talks:

  1. Data science for social impact - Janko Thyson
  2. Interactive spatial clusters - Malte Grosser

AOB:

We’re applying for sponsorship- what does this mean for you?
